programmes.show_description: Get your fix of all the best new releases in one handy playlist.
Damon Albarn and Jamie Hewlett talk new Gorillaz, and Bill Callahan and Lala Lala breakdown their new albums. Plus Matt Everitt picks some tracks from Mitski and Tony Bontana.
6 Music takes you through the early hours playing back to back music.
6 Music goes back to the 90s!
6 Music goes back to the 00s!
Chris Hawkins takes you through 30 minutes of remixed, re-versioned and re-imagined tracks. Featuring Pinkpantheress, Kneecap, Jaguar Ma and more.
New music and the biggest Friday bangers with Chris Hawkins.
Actor Amanda Seyfried joins Nick to talk about her latest film, The Testament of Ann Lee, and her collaboration with composer Daniel Blumberg.
Lauren brings a great selection of tunes to kick-start your weekend.
Craig spins some joyous tunes to get your weekend started, before opening up the Trunk of Funk!
It's Friday, so Huw is out to prove that any song sounds better when it's played on 6 Music by Huw Stephens - so let us know what you want to hear.

programmes.show_name: The People's Party with Femi Koleoso
programmes.show_description: The renowned UK Garage DJ and Producer paints a bright picture of his ideal Friday night in and night out, and shares an iconic Friday he's had recently.
Nath plays indie bangers from Broken Social Scene, Wolf Alice and The Vaccines!
An hour of British Indie hits from Anna Calvi, Franz Ferdinand, Wet Leg and Foals!

programmes.show_name: The 6 Mix with Mary Anne Hobbs
programmes.show_description: Chloe Robinson is b2b with her friend and collaborator Paleman for the 6 Mix ahead of their new cookie cutter/tiger EP released on her own label Pretty Weird.
(Some of) the best tracks to have soundtracked dance floors over the last 25 years!
6 Music takes you to the dark side with a playlist of the finest goth, electronic and dark pop music, with tracks from New Model Army, Childish Gambino, Brdmm and DJ Python.

programmes.show_name: Indie Forever Disco with Beth Ditto
programmes.show_description: Beth celebrates the biggest and best indie hits for the dance floor.
New age and ambient music pioneer Laraaji handpicks a two hour mix of beautiful calming tracks to boost your mindfulness.
Ease into Saturday with Afrodeutsche. The ultimate soft-launch for your weekend, two hours of fluid, deep-listening tracks designed to ground you before the day truly begins.
Mark and Stuart present a feast of great music and chat for weekend breakfast.
Deb Grant serves a heady selection of audio sunshine from hip hop to soul to funk to rock to dub and more, including music from Jill Scott, Sylvester, Black Sabbath, Pete Rodriguez.
Jamz gets your weekend party started with an uplifting array of alternative RnB, broken beat, global club sounds and leftfield electronica.
Joining the musical dots, soul, hip-hop, house, Afro, Latin, electronica, jazz and beyond.

programmes.show_name: The Craig Charles Funk and Soul Show
programmes.show_description: The best in funk and soul with Craig Charles.
Don's Saturday night selections cross time, space and genre. Expect culture clash curve-balls from Tenor Saw, Warmduscher, Mungo's Hi-Fi, Wet Leg and Elijah Minnelli.
SHERELLE delves into drum and bass deep-cuts for your Saturday night.
